token_str: Again , it is still more useless to inquire whether there is any essential connection between the two inequalities ; for this would be only asking , in other words , whether those who command are necessarily better than those who obey , and if strength of body or of mind , wisdom or virtue are always found in particular individuals , in proportion to their power or wealth : a question fit perhaps to be discussed by slaves in the hearing of their masters , but highly unbecoming to reasonable and free men in search of the truth .
